医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
双语能力与老年人大脑恢复能力更强有关人们早就知道双语对老年人的认知有益。研究表明，与只会说一种语言的成年人相比，它有助于将阿尔茨海默氏病的发病时间推迟长达五年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Bilingualism-linked-to-greater-brain-resilience-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Bilingualism-linked-to-greater-brain-resilience-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d00a44f-0583-445c-89a6-0a79ff011e10 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 14:23:34 -0400 Bilingualism linked to greater brain resilience in older adults
Senolytics 在盆腔器官脱垂小鼠模型中显示出希望2024年9月26日，一篇新的研究论文发表在Aging（被MEDLINE/PubMed列为“Aging (Albany NY)”和Web of Science的“Aging-US”）第16卷第19期，题为“Use of senolytics 达沙替尼和槲皮素可预防小鼠动物模型中的盆腔器官脱垂。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Senolytic-agents-show-promise-in-mouse-model-of-pelvic-organ-prolapse.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Senolytic-agents-show-promise-in-mouse-model-of-pelvic-organ-prolapse.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba1fc77c-75c1-4c1d-b89b-d0e7d98edc98 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 14:14:50 -0400 Senolytic agents show promise in mouse model of pelvic organ prolapse
新药显示出治疗运动神经元疾病的希望杜伦大学研究人员在《国际分子科学杂志》上发表的一项开创性研究揭示了针对运动神经元疾病 (MND) 的新疗法的有希望的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/New-drug-shows-promise-for-motor-neurone-disease-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/New-drug-shows-promise-for-motor-neurone-disease-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1e9df497-88ac-44f5-b229-d3a9c42bd708 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 13:57:21 -0400 New drug shows promise for motor neurone disease treatment
MRI 可以使许多直肠癌患者免于侵入性手术新研究表明，磁共振成像 (MRI) 可以使许多直肠癌患者免于进行可能带来终生副作用的侵入性手术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/MRI-can-spare-many-病人-with-直肠癌-from- Invasive-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/MRI-can-spare-many-病人-with-直肠癌-from- Invasive-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e1c28a0-998c-4abc-bd2e-2d1cda1917db Tue, 22 Oct 2024 13:46:23 -0400 MRI can spare many patients with rectal cancer from invasive surgery
2 型糖尿病患者可能受益于减少碳水化合物摄入量根据内分泌学会《临床内分泌与代谢杂志》发表的新研究，采用低碳水化合物饮食的 2 型糖尿病成人可能会发现其 β 细胞功能的益处，使他们能够更好地控制疾病，并可能停止用药。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Type-2-diabetes-病人-may-benefit-from-reduced-carboHydrate-intake.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Type-2-diabetes-病人-may-benefit-from-reduced-carboHydrate-intake.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5dc25d6-8a01-482a-a1af-1c5d0ba73788 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 13:32:33 -0400 Type 2 diabetes patients may benefit from reduced carbohydrate intake
关于基因转录如何影响基因组运动的新见解一组科学家发现了基因活性、基因组包装和全基因组运动之间令人惊讶的联系，揭示了直接影响基因调控和表达的基因组组织的各个方面。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/New-insights-into-how-gene-transcription-influences-genome-motion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/New-insights-into-how-gene-transcription-influences-genome-motion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5cefcbe8-245c-446b-8629-977b251d8377 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 13:09:23 -0400 New insights into how gene transcription influences genome motion
研究发现空气污染与儿童花生过敏之间的联系一项新的研究表明，婴儿时期接触较高水平的空气污染与整个童年时期花生过敏有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Study-finds-connection- Between-air-pollution-and-childhood-peanut-allergies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Study-finds-connection- Between-air-pollution-and-childhood-peanut-allergies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67d45995-92cc-4f43-bf51-60f45896cde4 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 12:43:43 -0400 Study finds connection between air pollution and childhood peanut allergies
疾病预防控制中心的新报告强调了流感住院和疫苗接种方面的差异根据 CDC 的一份新的生命体征报告，美国的黑人、西班牙裔和美洲印第安人/阿拉斯加原住民 (AI/AN) 成年人更有可能因流感住院，并且不太可能接种流感疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/New-CDC-report-highlights-disparities-in-flu-hospitalization-and-vaccination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/New-CDC-report-highlights-disparities-in-flu-hospitalization-and-vaccination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8df7a22-5ca0-4fb8-aa13-9aa2f5413af0 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 12:34:56 -0400 New CDC report highlights disparities in flu hospitalization and vaccination
没有嗅觉的人呼吸的改变可以解释健康问题研究表明，嗅觉丧失症患者的呼吸模式发生了改变，将嗅觉丧失与健康问题联系起来，并强调了嗅觉在呼吸中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Altered-breathing-in-those-without-a-sense-of-smell-could-explain-health-issues.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/Altered-breathing-in-those-without-a-sense-of-smell-could-explain-health-issues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f4afff0-c7dc-44bc-8f5a-097e1be801f5 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 12:00:00 -0400 Altered breathing in those without a sense of smell could explain health issues
新研究揭示 GPR31 在肠道感染免疫反应中的作用大阪大学的研究人员发现，“肠道监视”细胞中的 GPR31 路径可以检测细菌代谢物并触发免疫反应，为药物开发、疫苗和益生菌对抗感染开辟新的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/New-research-reveals-GPR31s-role-in-immune-response-to-gut-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241022/New-research-reveals-GPR31s-role-in-immune-response-to-gut-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4f33925-b373-4929-a316-68ff83c04af6 Tue, 22 Oct 2024 10:01:00 -0400 New research reveals GPR31's role in immune response to gut infections
